00014       private string name;
00015       private MethodAttributes attributes;

00027       public UserConstructor(IdEntry declaringType, IdEntry[] parameters, String[] parNames, MethodAttributes attributes)
00028       {
00029          this.declaringType = declaringType;
00030          this.name = ((attributes & MethodAttributes.Static) == 0) ? ConstructorInfo.ConstructorName : ConstructorInfo.TypeConstructorName;
00031          this.attributes = attributes;
00032          this.parameters = new ParameterInfo[parameters.Length];
00033          this.symbolTable = new SymbolTable();
00034          this.symbolTable.OpenScope();
00035          for (int i = 0; i < parameters.Length; i++ )
00036          {
00037             this.parameters[i] = new UserParameter(parameters[i], parNames[i], i + 1);
00038             IdEntry id = new IdEntry();
00039             id.ReflectionObject = this.parameters[i];
00040             this.symbolTable.Enter(parNames[i], id);
00041          }
00042       }
00043
